properties.description: Extract data from on-prem sql and load them into Data Lake RAW layer. This pipeline will handle full and delta loads.

activities.name: SetCurrentCSTDateTimeForFileName
activities.description: Setting up the current datetime that will be used for filename in data lake

activities.name: SetCurrentCSTDateTime
activities.description: Setting current date time in CST format for setting up watermark for next load

activities.name: Set_YYYYMMDD_Path
activities.description: Setting Date path for ADLS folders

activities.name: GetSqlTableList
activities.description: getting the list of SQL tables from control table stored in Azure SQL

sqlReaderQuery.value:
SELECT *, convert(varchar,DeltaLastWatermarkDateTime,120) as FormattedLastWatermarkDateTime
FROM ETL.ControlTableSourceToAdlsLoad
WHERE IsActiveFlag = 'Y'
AND SourceType = 'SQLServer'
AND (PipelineTriggerName = '@{pipeline().parameters.PipelineTriggerName}'
OR PipelineTriggerName IS NULL)

SELECT '@{pipeline().DataFactory}' as DataFactoryName,
'@{pipeline().Pipeline}' as PipelineName,
'@{pipeline().RunId}' as RunId,
'SQL_To_DataLake' as SourceToTargetType,
'@{item().SourceExtractMethod}' as SourceExtractMethod,
'@{item().SourceFullExtractOverrideFlag}' as SourceFullExtractOverrideFlag,
'@{item().SourceServerName}' as SourceServerName,
'@{item().SourceDatabaseName}' as SourceDatabaseName,
'@{item().SourceSchemaName}' as SourceSchemaName,
'@{item().SourceTableName}' as SourceTableName,
'@{item().DataLakeContainer}' as TargetDataLakeContainerName,
'@{concat(item().DataLakeFolder,'/FULL/',item().SourceSchemaName,'/',item().DestinationTargetFolder)}' as TargetDirectoryName,
'@{concat('FULL_',item().DestinationTargetFolder,'.parquet')}' as TargetFileName,
'@{pipeline().TriggerType}' as TriggerType,
'@{pipeline().TriggerID}' as TriggerId,
'@{pipeline().TriggerName}' as TriggerName,
'@{pipeline().TriggerTime}' as TriggerTime,
'@{activity('CopyOnPremToADLS').output.rowsCopied}' as RowsCopied,
'@{activity('CopyOnPremToADLS').output.rowsRead}' as RowsRead,
'@{activity('CopyOnPremToADLS').output.usedParallelCopies}' as NoParallelCopies,
'@{activity('CopyOnPremToADLS').output.copyDuration}' as CopyDurationInSecs,
'@{activity('CopyOnPremToADLS').output.effectiveIntegrationRuntime}' as effectiveIntegrationRuntime,
'@{activity('CopyOnPremToADLS').output.executionDetails[0].source}' as SourceType,
'@{activity('CopyOnPremToADLS').output.executionDetails[0].sink}' as SinkType,
'@{activity('CopyOnPremToADLS').output.executionDetails[0].status}' as ExecutionStatus,
'@{activity('CopyOnPremToADLS').output.executionDetails[0].start}' as CopyActivityStartTime,
'@{utcnow()}' as CopyActivityEndTime,
'@{activity('CopyOnPremToADLS').output.executionDetails[0].detailedDurations.queuingDuration}' as CopyActivityQueuingDurationInSecs,
'@{activity('CopyOnPremToADLS').output.executionDetails[0].detailedDurations.timeToFirstByte}' as CopyActivityPreCopyScriptDurationInSecs,
'@{activity('CopyOnPremToADLS').output.executionDetails[0].detailedDurations.transferDuration}' as CopyActivityTransferDurationInSecs,
null as ErrorMessage

SELECT '@{pipeline().DataFactory}' as DataFactoryName,
'@{pipeline().Pipeline}' as PipelineName,
'@{pipeline().RunId}' as RunId,
'SQL_To_DataLake' as SourceToTargetType,
'@{item().SourceExtractMethod}' as SourceExtractMethod,
'@{item().SourceFullExtractOverrideFlag}' as SourceFullExtractOverrideFlag,
'@{item().SourceServerName}' as SourceServerName,
'@{item().SourceDatabaseName}' as SourceDatabaseName,
'@{item().SourceSchemaName}' as SourceSchemaName,
'@{item().SourceTableName}' as SourceTableName,
'@{item().DataLakeContainer}' as TargetDataLakeContainerName,
'@{concat(item().DataLakeFolder,'/FULL/',item().SourceSchemaName,'/',item().DestinationTargetFolder)}' as TargetDirectoryName,
'@{concat('FULL_',item().DestinationTargetFolder,'.parquet')}' as TargetFileName,
'@{pipeline().TriggerType}' as TriggerType,
'@{pipeline().TriggerID}' as TriggerId,
'@{pipeline().TriggerName}' as TriggerName,
'@{pipeline().TriggerTime}' as TriggerTime,
null as RowsCopied,
null as RowsRead,
'@{activity('CopyOnPremToADLS').output.usedParallelCopies}' as NoParallelCopies,
'@{activity('CopyOnPremToADLS').output.copyDuration}' as CopyDurationInSecs,
'@{activity('CopyOnPremToADLS').output.effectiveIntegrationRuntime}' as effectiveIntegrationRuntime,
'@{activity('CopyOnPremToADLS').output.executionDetails[0].source}' as SourceType,
'@{activity('CopyOnPremToADLS').output.executionDetails[0].sink}' as SinkType,
'@{activity('CopyOnPremToADLS').output.executionDetails[0].status}' as ExecutionStatus,
'@{activity('CopyOnPremToADLS').output.executionDetails[0].start}' as CopyActivityStartTime,
'@{utcnow()}' as CopyActivityEndTime,
'' as CopyActivityQueuingDurationInSecs,
'' as CopyActivityPreCopyScriptDurationInSecs,
'' as CopyActivityTransferDurationInSecs,
'@{replace(activity('CopyOnPremToADLS').output.errors[0].Message,'''','')}' as ErrorMessage

@concat(' DECLARE @s VARCHAR(MAX)
DECLARE @schemaname VARCHAR (50) = ''' ,item().SourceSchemaName, '''
DECLARE @tablename VARCHAR(500) = ''', item().SourceTableName,'''
SELECT @s = ISNULL(@s + '', '','''') + ''['' + c.name + '']'' + '' as [''+replace(c.name,'' '','''')+''] ''
FROM sys.all_columns c join sys.tables t 
ON c.object_id = t.object_id
WHERE t.schema_id = SCHEMA_ID(@schemaname)
and t.name =  @tablename 
SELECT @s as COLUMNS' )

SELECT '@{pipeline().DataFactory}' as DataFactoryName,
'@{pipeline().Pipeline}' as PipelineName,
'@{pipeline().RunId}' as RunId,
'SQL_To_DataLake' as SourceToTargetType,
'@{item().SourceExtractMethod}' as SourceExtractMethod,
'@{item().SourceFullExtractOverrideFlag}' as SourceFullExtractOverrideFlag,
'@{item().SourceServerName}' as SourceServerName,
'@{item().SourceDatabaseName}' as SourceDatabaseName,
'@{item().SourceSchemaName}' as SourceSchemaName,
'@{item().SourceTableName}' as SourceTableName,
'@{item().DataLakeContainer}' as TargetDataLakeContainerName,
'@{concat(item().DataLakeFolder,'/DELTA/',item().SourceSchemaName,'/',item().DestinationTargetFolder,'/',variables('varYYYYMMDD'))}' as TargetDirectoryName,
'@{concat('DELTA_',item().DestinationTargetFolder,'_',variables('varCurrentDateTimeCSTFilename'),'.parquet')}' as TargetFileName,
'@{pipeline().TriggerType}' as TriggerType,
'@{pipeline().TriggerID}' as TriggerId,
'@{pipeline().TriggerName}' as TriggerName,
'@{pipeline().TriggerTime}' as TriggerTime,
'@{activity('CopyOnPremToADLSDelta').output.rowsCopied}' as RowsCopied,
'@{activity('CopyOnPremToADLSDelta').output.rowsRead}' as RowsRead,
'@{activity('CopyOnPremToADLSDelta').output.usedParallelCopies}' as NoParallelCopies,
'@{activity('CopyOnPremToADLSDelta').output.copyDuration}' as CopyDurationInSecs,
'@{activity('CopyOnPremToADLSDelta').output.effectiveIntegrationRuntime}' as effectiveIntegrationRuntime,
'@{activity('CopyOnPremToADLSDelta').output.executionDetails[0].source}' as SourceType,
'@{activity('CopyOnPremToADLSDelta').output.executionDetails[0].sink}' as SinkType,
'@{activity('CopyOnPremToADLSDelta').output.executionDetails[0].status}' as ExecutionStatus,
'@{activity('CopyOnPremToADLSDelta').output.executionDetails[0].start}' as CopyActivityStartTime,
'@{utcnow()}' as CopyActivityEndTime,
'@{activity('CopyOnPremToADLSDelta').output.executionDetails[0].detailedDurations.queuingDuration}' as CopyActivityQueuingDurationInSecs,
'@{activity('CopyOnPremToADLSDelta').output.executionDetails[0].detailedDurations.timeToFirstByte}' as CopyActivityPreCopyScriptDurationInSecs,
'@{activity('CopyOnPremToADLSDelta').output.executionDetails[0].detailedDurations.transferDuration}' as CopyActivityTransferDurationInSecs,
null as ErrorMessage

SELECT '@{pipeline().DataFactory}' as DataFactoryName,
'@{pipeline().Pipeline}' as PipelineName,
'@{pipeline().RunId}' as RunId,
'SQL_To_DataLake' as SourceToTargetType,
'@{item().SourceExtractMethod}' as SourceExtractMethod,
'@{item().SourceFullExtractOverrideFlag}' as SourceFullExtractOverrideFlag,
'@{item().SourceServerName}' as SourceServerName,
'@{item().SourceDatabaseName}' as SourceDatabaseName,
'@{item().SourceSchemaName}' as SourceSchemaName,
'@{item().SourceTableName}' as SourceTableName,
'@{item().DataLakeContainer}' as TargetDataLakeContainerName,
'@{concat(item().DataLakeFolder,'/DELTA/',item().SourceSchemaName,'/',item().DestinationTargetFolder,'/',variables('varYYYYMMDD'))}' as TargetDirectoryName,
'@{concat('DELTA_',item().DestinationTargetFolder,'_',variables('varCurrentDateTimeCSTFilename'),'.parquet')}' as TargetFileName,
'@{pipeline().TriggerType}' as TriggerType,
'@{pipeline().TriggerID}' as TriggerId,
'@{pipeline().TriggerName}' as TriggerName,
'@{pipeline().TriggerTime}' as TriggerTime,
null as RowsCopied,
null as RowsRead,
'@{activity('CopyOnPremToADLSDelta').output.usedParallelCopies}' as NoParallelCopies,
'@{activity('CopyOnPremToADLSDelta').output.copyDuration}' as CopyDurationInSecs,
'@{activity('CopyOnPremToADLSDelta').output.effectiveIntegrationRuntime}' as effectiveIntegrationRuntime,
'@{activity('CopyOnPremToADLSDelta').output.executionDetails[0].source}' as SourceType,
'@{activity('CopyOnPremToADLSDelta').output.executionDetails[0].sink}' as SinkType,
'@{activity('CopyOnPremToADLSDelta').output.executionDetails[0].status}' as ExecutionStatus,
'@{activity('CopyOnPremToADLSDelta').output.executionDetails[0].start}' as CopyActivityStartTime,
'@{utcnow()}' as CopyActivityEndTime,
'' as CopyActivityQueuingDurationInSecs,
'' as CopyActivityPreCopyScriptDurationInSecs,
'' as CopyActivityTransferDurationInSecs,
'@{replace(activity('CopyOnPremToADLSDelta').output.errors[0].Message,'''','')}' as ErrorMessage

select cast(string_agg ('ds.['+cast(value as varchar(max))+']=ct.['+cast(value as varchar(max))+ ']',' and ') as varchar(max)) as SplitSourceKeyColumns
FROM string_split('@{item().SourceKeyColumnList}',',')

@concat(' DECLARE @s VARCHAR(MAX)
DECLARE @schemaname VARCHAR (50) = ''' ,item().SourceSchemaName, '''
DECLARE @tablename VARCHAR(500) = ''', item().SourceTableName,'''
SELECT @s = ISNULL(@s + '', '','''') + ''ds.['' + c.name + '']'' + '' as [''+replace(c.name,'' '','''')+''] ''
FROM sys.all_columns c join sys.tables t 
ON c.object_id = t.object_id
WHERE t.schema_id = SCHEMA_ID(@schemaname)
and t.name =  @tablename
SELECT @s as COLUMNS' )
